welcome_message_body: Welcome to Buenos Aires, a vibrant city known for its tango, delicious cuisine, and rich history. Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Espetinho Sabores & Opções
restaurants.description: Espetinho Sabores & Opções is a brazilian restaurant located in Buenos Aires.
restaurants.address: Av. Major Severino Mendes 74, BUENOS AIRES, PE, 55845-000

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal A

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
